name: Cease: The Journey
description:
A 2D platformer Game where as a player you experience a fun filled gameplay and our touch of humour. Experience playing as Hollin a mage saving his citizens from a mighty dragon.

This is our 2nd Ludum dare project based on the theme “Stuck on loop”. Hope you all like it.. And please make sure to play and have fun..

We concentrated more on programming and a little bit equally on both animation and design part.
